resources.string: Not an Xperia SP … cannot continue!
Welcome to the &appName; app, designed by an Xperia SP fan just as a bit of fun, and to share with other Sony Xperia fans.
Firstly, and most importantly, this app requires root access. If your phone is not rooted, then this app will simply do nothing!

Secondly, it was designed to run only on the Sony Xperia SP. Although there are other models that support lighting effects, like the Xperia U, they have a very different way of turning those lights on & off! Again, if your phone is not an Xperia SP, then this app will simply do nothing!
If all is well after returning from this intro, wait a few seconds & you should be prompted for root acccess.
The rainbow & dance sequences are based on a bash script originally shared on XDA-Developers forum by nixx-X1 way back in 2013.
Basically, the individual commands from that script are stored here in a database, then called on in a variety of ways, depending on the chosen effect.
The sliders and buttons on the main screen are pretty self-explanatory.
Try different variations to find out which you prefer =)
Be aware that any other app or system process that has control over the lights may override this app … it\'s basically a last in/first out situation.
The lights will continue to run even when the app is in the background, or the screen is off.
But don\'t just hit the Back button to go to another app, as that will shut everything down & quit … instead, you would need to use the Home or Recents buttons to switch to another app.
Sometimes the RootTools API gets overwhelmed & just stops processing commands! If this does happen, just turn off the lights & restart the app. In severe cases, you may need to restart your phone.
